hero.title: Shaping the Future of
hero.description: We are committed to bridging the gap between traditional education and the rapidly evolving needs of the tech industry, creating pathways to success for the next generation of tech leaders.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: How we became Japan's leading IT education provider
story.paragraph1: Forum Information Academy was founded in 2010 with a mission to bridge the gap between traditional education and the rapidly evolving needs of the tech industry.
story.paragraph2: Starting with just 15 students and 3 instructors in a small office in Shibuya, we have grown into one of Japan's most respected IT education institutions, with over 5,000 graduates who have gone on to successful careers in technology.
story.paragraph3: Our journey has been defined by a commitment to excellence, innovation, and student success. As technology evolves, so do we, continuously updating our curriculum to ensure our students are prepared for the challenges of tomorrow.

timeline.dataScience: Expanded curriculum to include data science

response.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
response.answer: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 business hours. For urgent matters, please call our office directly.

tour.question: Can I schedule a campus tour?
tour.answer: Yes! We offer campus tours Monday through Friday. Please contact our admissions office to schedule a visit.

virtual.question: Do you have a virtual meeting option?
virtual.answer: Yes, we can arrange video calls for international students or those unable to visit in person.

financial.question: How do I apply for financial assistance?
financial.answer: Please contact our admissions team directly for information about scholarships, payment plans, and other financial options.

header.title: The FIA Advantage
header.subtitle: Discover why top employers seek out our graduates and what sets our education approach apart in the tech industry.

partnerships.title: Industry Partnerships
partnerships.description: Access exclusive opportunities through our network of tech leaders. Our curriculum is co-developed with industry experts, ensuring you learn the skills employers are actively seeking.

instructors.title: Expert Instructors
instructors.description: Learn from tech veterans who've built successful products and led engineering teams at top companies. Our instructors bring real-world challenges and solutions directly to the classroom.

facilities.title: Cutting-Edge Facilities
facilities.description: Immerse yourself in professional-grade environments with industry-standard tools and technologies. Our recently renovated campus features specialized labs for every technology track.

career.title: Career Acceleration
career.description: Our dedicated career team works with you from day one to define your goals and open doors to opportunities. Benefit from exclusive hiring events, interview coaching, and portfolio development.

certifications.title: Industry-Recognized Certifications
certifications.description: Graduate with more than just a diploma. Our programs include preparation for top certifications that employers value, giving you multiple credentials to showcase your expertise.

support.title: Personalized Learning Support
support.description: Never feel lost in your learning journey. Our mentors provide 1:1 guidance, while our comprehensive digital platform offers 24/7 access to resources, practice exercises, and community support.

cta.title: Beyond the Classroom
cta.description: Explore our unique learning philosophy, state-of-the-art facilities, and hear from students who transformed their careers with FIA. We're more than just courses—we're a community dedicated to your success in tech.

testimonial.quote: The practical focus and industry connections at FIA completely changed my career trajectory. Within two months of graduating, I had multiple job offers from top tech companies.

author.name: Yuki Tanaka
author.title: Software Engineer at TechVision Inc., Class of 2024

campusTour.question: How can I schedule a campus tour?
campusTour.answer: Campus tours are available Monday through Friday. You can schedule one by contacting our admissions office or using our online booking system.

deadlines.question: What are the application deadlines?
deadlines.answer: Applications are accepted on a rolling basis, but we recommend applying at least 2 months before your desired start date to ensure processing time.

header.title: Our Featured Courses
header.subtitle: Accelerate your tech career with our industry-focused, practical programs

webDev.title: Full-Stack Web Development
webDev.description: Master both front-end and back-end technologies to build complete web applications. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database integration.

dataScience.title: Data Science & Analytics
dataScience.description: Learn to analyze and interpret complex data sets using Python, R, SQL, and visualization tools. Includes machine learning fundamentals and real-world projects.

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
cybersecurity.description: Develop skills to protect systems and networks from digital attacks. Learn threat detection, ethical hacking, security protocols, and incident response.

cloudComputing.title: Cloud Computing & DevOps
cloudComputing.description: Master cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Learn infrastructure as code, containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and microservices architecture.

aiMl.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
aiMl.description: Dive deep into AI algorithms, neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing. Build intelligent systems that learn and adapt.

mobileDev.title: Mobile App Development
mobileDev.description: Create native and cross-platform mobile applications. Master React Native, Flutter, iOS and Android development, and app deployment strategies.

hero.description: Join Forum Information Academy for industry-driven tech training that transforms beginners into professionals ready for today's digital economy.

testimonialsSection.title: From Applicants to Graduates

requirements.question: What are the admission requirements?
requirements.answer: Our programs are designed for students from all backgrounds. While no prior experience is required, we look for motivated individuals who can demonstrate problem-solving skills and a commitment to learning.

duration.question: How long does the application process take?
duration.answer: The online application takes approximately 10-15 minutes to complete. After submission, you'll typically hear back from us within 1-2 business days to schedule your interview.

payment.question: Are there payment plans available?
payment.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment options including installment plans and income share agreements for qualified applicants. Financial details will be discussed after acceptance.

defer.question: What if I need to defer my enrollment?
defer.answer: We understand circumstances change. If you're accepted, you can defer your enrollment to the next cohort. Please contact the admissions team as early as possible.

hero.subtitle: Our dedicated career services team helps you transition from student to industry professional with personalized support.

careerSupport.subtitle: We provide end-to-end career support to ensure your successful transition into the tech industry.

successStories.title: Graduate Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Our alumni have secured positions at some of the world's most innovative companies.

taroYamada.name: Taro Yamada
taroYamada.quote: The career support at FIA was instrumental in helping me land my dream job at Google. Their interview preparation was spot-on.

hanakoSato.name: Hanako Sato
hanakoSato.quote: FIA's networking events connected me directly with Mercari's recruiting team. Three weeks after graduation, I had multiple offers.

michaelChen.name: Michael Chen
michaelChen.quote: The personalized career coaching helped me reframe my previous experience for tech roles. Forever grateful for FIA's support.

faq.title: Career Services FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to commonly asked questions about our career support programs.

whenBegins.question: When does career support begin?
whenBegins.answer: Career support begins from day one of your program. We integrate career readiness throughout the curriculum, with dedicated career service intensives in the later stages of your training.

accessDuration.question: How long do I have access to career services?
accessDuration.answer: Graduates receive unlimited career support for 12 months after graduation. After that, you'll join our alumni network with access to exclusive events and opportunities.

jobGuarantee.question: Do you guarantee job placement?
jobGuarantee.answer: While we don't guarantee placement, our 93% employment rate within 6 months of graduation speaks to the effectiveness of our career services. Our team works tirelessly to connect you with opportunities that match your skills.

visaSponsorship.question: Can I get help with visa sponsorship for international roles?
visaSponsorship.answer: Yes, we have experience helping graduates secure roles with visa sponsorship. We maintain relationships with companies that are open to sponsoring qualified international candidates.

freelancing.question: What if I'm interested in freelancing or entrepreneurship?
freelancing.answer: Our career services team also supports graduates interested in freelancing or launching startups. We offer specialized guidance on building a client base, setting rates, and establishing your business.

david.quote: Forum Academy's AI program is at the forefront of technology education. The research opportunities and cutting-edge facilities prepared me for my role in AI research.

successStats.description: These aren't just statistics - they represent real lives transformed, dreams achieved, and futures secured through world-class education.

cta.badge: Ready to Write Your Success Story?
cta.title: Your Journey to
cta.description: Join thousands of successful graduates who transformed their careers through our industry-leading programs. Your future in tech is just one application away.

hero.description: Discover the latest announcements, events, and achievements from our vibrant academic community.

featured.title: International Technology Symposium 2024
featured.excerpt: Join us for a groundbreaking symposium featuring leading experts in artificial intelligence, robotics, and quantum computing. Network with industry professionals and discover the latest innovations shaping our future.

techSymposium.title: International Technology Symposium 2024
techSymposium.excerpt: Join leading experts in AI, robotics, and quantum computing for an inspiring day of innovation and discovery.

industryPartnership.title: New Industry Partnership Announcement
industryPartnership.excerpt: We're excited to announce our new collaboration with major tech companies to enhance student opportunities.

springOpenHouse.title: Spring Open House Event
springOpenHouse.excerpt: Explore our campus, meet faculty, and discover the programs that will shape your future in technology.

hackathonWinners.title: Student Hackathon Winners Announced
hackathonWinners.excerpt: Congratulations to our talented students who showcased innovative solutions at the annual hackathon competition.

quantumCourse.title: New Quantum Computing Course Launch
quantumCourse.excerpt: Dive into the future of computing with our newly launched quantum computing specialization program.

aiEthicsLecture.title: AI Ethics Guest Lecture Series
aiEthicsLecture.excerpt: Join renowned experts as they discuss the ethical implications and future of artificial intelligence.

noResults.title: No news found in
noResults.description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new updates.

newsPage.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

campusLife.title: Life at Our Campus
campusLife.subtitle: Discover the vibrant community, modern facilities, and endless opportunities that make our campus a perfect place to learn and grow.

studentLife.title: Student Life
studentLife.description: Vibrant community with diverse student organizations, cultural events, and social activities that enrich your academic journey.

clubs.title: Clubs & Activities
clubs.description: Join over 50 student clubs and organizations, from technology societies to cultural groups and sports teams.

dining.title: Campus Dining
dining.description: Enjoy delicious and diverse dining options featuring local Niigata specialties and international cuisine.

sports.title: Sports & Recreation
sports.description: Stay active with our modern gymnasium, fitness centers, and various sports facilities for all skill levels.

map.title: Campus Map & Access
map.description: Navigate our campus easily and find the best routes to reach us from anywhere in Niigata.

dining.galleryDesc: Taste the authentic flavors of Niigata with our diverse selection of local and international cuisine.

facilities.title: Our Facilities
facilities.subtitle: Experience cutting-edge technology and modern infrastructure designed to support your academic and personal growth.

campus.title: Modern Campus Facilities
campus.description: Our state-of-the-art campus features modern classrooms, advanced laboratories, and collaborative spaces designed for 21st-century learning.

niigataLife.title: Life in Niigata
niigataLife.description: Experience the perfect blend of urban convenience and natural beauty in Niigata, a city rich in culture, cuisine, and seasonal charm.

niigataLife.title: Life in Niigata
niigataLife.subtitle: Experience the unique charm of Niigata, where traditional Japanese culture meets modern innovation in a city known for its natural beauty, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality.

nature.title: Natural Beauty
nature.description: From beautiful coastlines to majestic mountains, Niigata offers breathtaking landscapes throughout the seasons.

culture.title: Rich Culture
culture.description: Immerse yourself in authentic Japanese culture with traditional festivals, local crafts, and historical sites.

transportation.title: Convenient Access
transportation.description: Excellent transportation links connect you to Tokyo and other major cities via shinkansen and local trains.

seasons.title: Four Seasons
seasons.description: Experience Japan's distinct seasons, from cherry blossoms in spring to world-class skiing in winter.
